TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImportManyAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies that a property, field, or parameter should be populated with all matching exports by the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, importing the set of exports with the default contract name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the type of the property, field, or parameter that is marked with this attribute.
The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string contractName) cil managed

Docs.param: The contract name of the exports to import, or or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, importing the set of exports with the specified contract name.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the property, field, or parameter type that is marked with this attribute.
The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type contractType) cil managed

Docs.param: The type to derive the contract name of the exports to import, or to use the default contract name.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, importing the set of exports with the contract name derived from the specified type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on `contractType`.
The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on the property, field, or parameter type that is marked with this attribute.
The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string contractName, class System.Type contractType) cil managed

Docs.param: The contract name of the exports to import, or or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
The type of the export to import.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, importing the set of exports with the specified contract name and contract type.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the decorated property or field will be recomposed when exports that provide the matching contract change.
Docs.value:
if the property or field allows for recomposition when exports that provide the same are added or removed from the ; otherwise, .
The default value is .

Docs.summary: Gets the contract name of the exports to import.
Docs.value: The contract name of the exports to import. The default value is an empty string ("").

Docs.summary: Gets the contract type of the export to import.
Docs.value: The type of the export that this import is expecting. The default value is , which means that the type will be obtained by looking at the type on the member that this import is attached to. If the type is , the import will match any exported type.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the importer requires a specific for the exports used to satisfy this import.
Docs.value:
One of the following values:
, if the importer does not require a specific . This is the default.
to require that all used exports be shared by all parts in the container.
to require that all used exports be non-shared in a container. In this case, each part receives their own instance.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the scopes from which this import may be satisfied.
Docs.value: A value that specifies the scopes from which this import may be satisfied.
